lumis.portal.el

Class PortalFunctionMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • lumis.portal.el.PortalFunctionMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FunctionMapper, IExtendedFunctionMapper
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PageWebResourceFunctionMapper

    public class PortalFunctionMapper
extends Object
implements IExtendedFunctionMapper
    Portal general EL function mapper.

    Resolves EL functions to be available in any portal context.

    Since:
    5.6.0
    Version:
    $Revision: 17593 $ $Date: 2015-07-17 11:21:36 -0300 (Fri, 17 Jul 2015) $

    • Method Detail

      • localize

        public static String localize(String[] args)
                       throws PortalException
        Resolves the string.
        Parameters:
        args - the localize function parameters. First argument is the identifier of the string to be localized. The second argument is optional, and is the resource path to be included in the localization.
        Returns:
        localized string.
        Throws:
        PortalException - if an error occur localizing the string.
        Since:
        5.6.0
